<div class="section3">

  <div class="text-box left">
    This is the first text box on the left with fade-in effect.
  </div>
  <div class="text-box right">
    <p>This is the second text box on the right with fade-in effect.</p>
  </div>

<div class="section4">
  <div class="vertical-line"></div>
  <div class="text-box left">
    <p>This is the third text box on the left with fade-in effect.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="text-box right">
    <p>This is the fourth text box on the right with fade-in effect.</p>
  </div>
</div>






<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    const textBoxes = document.querySelectorAll('.text-box');

    function handleScroll() {
      textBoxes.forEach(textBox => {
        const boxPosition = textBox.getBoundingClientRect().top;
        const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;
        const boxBottom = textBox.getBoundingClientRect().bottom;

        // Trigger fade-in when the text box is within the viewport
        if (boxPosition < windowHeight - 100 && boxBottom > 100) {
          textBox.classList.add('show');
          textBox.classList.remove('hide');
        } else {
          // Trigger fade-out when it goes out of the viewport
          textBox.classList.add('hide');
          textBox.classList.remove('show');
        }
      });
    }

    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);

    // Trigger the effect immediately in case some boxes are already visible
    handleScroll();
  });
</script>
